summary: Ravenous Plot Bunny - The Tri-Wizard Tournament
title: Ravenous Plot Bunny - The Tri-Wizard Tournament
excerpt: Plot holes. Some are only tiny; but others challenge the Grand Canyon. What does Harry do about the Tr-Wizard Tournament if he decides to think outside the box? And not about winning, but just surviving?

summary:
Umbridge: how do you plead?
Harry: *looks at Dumbledore*
Dumbledore: *mouths “not guilty”*
Harry: snot silky.
Dumbledore: *bangs...
body:
Umbridge: how do you plead?
Harry: *looks at Dumbledore*
Dumbledore: *mouths “not guilty”*
Harry: snot silky.
Dumbledore: *bangs head on desk* For fuck’s sake, just lock them up.

dialogue.name: Dumbledore
dialogue.label: Dumbledore:
dialogue.phrase: *bangs head on desk* For fuck’s sake, just lock them up.

blog.name: hcconn
blog.title: WWBD?
blog.description: Originally a personal blog that slowly devolved into a mostly Buffy Blog. Still some personal stuff, other fandoms, other random stuff I just like. I missed my calling as a Victorian noblewoman with a delicate disposition. Female, Bi, too old for this, done with everything, battling depression with intermittent success, losing against PCOS, such low self esteem it's not even funny, fake it till you make it outlook, absurdist, humanist, oversharer who wants to be all private and mysterious, optimistic, all I want to do in life is travel the whole world.

summary: Hermione is a muggle who marries a wizard and upon being introduced to the magical world proceeds to conquer it as thoroughly as...
body:
Hermione is a muggle who marries a wizard and upon being introduced to the magical world proceeds to conquer it as thoroughly as she did as a witch.

(Hermione is not intimidated by your magic, she has brains, books and science on her side.)

summary: Why I like this doodle.  It could be Sherlock Holmes and Watson,  it could be Sirius Black and Remus Lupin or it could be an...
caption:
Why I like this doodle. It could be Sherlock Holmes and Watson, it could be Sirius Black and Remus Lupin or it could be an older Howell Jenkins that finally embraced his natural hair and Ben Sullivan. In any case, it’s my ideal guy and a male version of my own bff.

Note: doodle not mine.

summary: Hey wait a sec I’m fuckin confused and intrigued?? Why do you guys think Snape used muffliato? Like what do you think he used it...
body:
Hey wait a sec I’m fuckin confused and intrigued?? Why do you guys think Snape used muffliato? Like what do you think he used it for???

Did he use it in his house to mask his presence? To listen to music without disturbing his dad? To hide in plain sight, even at school?

summary:
Slytherin: Why are you calling me this late?
Hufflepuff: I need your help. I’ve done something bad, very bad. 
Slytherin: Put...
body:
Slytherin: Why are you calling me this late?

Hufflepuff: I need your help. I’ve done something bad, very bad.

Slytherin: Put the corpse on ice, I’m on my way.

Hufflepuff: What? No, it’s not— Why would I—

summary: Dark as a Raven's Wing, An Alternate Beginning
title: Dark as a Raven's Wing, An Alternate Beginning
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2NQpugw

by RoboNekoChan1991

I previously had two works up here before, but due to an unhealthy past relationship my account and works are now gone. I am back, and while I don’t have the original works, I am trying my hand at fanfiction again.

So, I never liked several parts of the Harry Potter universe, so I’ve re-imagined it the way I wold like it to have been.

This is really a prequel for a future work, I tell the story of the first war and that of Severus Snape finding love in the midst of the war. Severus is no longer the heart broken, miserable man, he deserved better than Lily Potter.

I write Slytherins being Slytherins, but that isnt a bad thing.

Words: 1776, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/F, F/M, M/M, Multi, Other
  • Characters: Severus Snape, Lucius Malfoy, Draco Malfoy, Hadrian Malfoy, Narcissa Black Malfoy, Bellatrix Black Lestrange, Rodolphus Lestrange, Regulus Black, Tom Riddle | Voldemort, Sirius Black, Remus Lupin, Original Characters
  • Relationships: Severus Snape/Original Female Character(s), Lucius Malfoy/Narcissa Black Malfoy, Bellatrix Black Lestrange/Rodolphus Lestrange, Regulus Black/Voldemort, Sirius Black/Remus Lupin
  • Additional Tags: Harry is a Malfoy, Voldemort isnt evil, Young Severus Snape, Young Death Eaters, Good Dark Side, Weasley Bashing, Albus Dumbledore Bashing, Evil Albus Dumbledore, Good Slytherins


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2NQpugw

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: the monster book of monsters is such a good Hagrid Thing though everyone treats it with suspicion and caution and anger because...
body:
the monster book of monsters is such a good Hagrid Thing though

everyone treats it with suspicion and caution and anger because it looks scary, so it lashes out at them and hurts them. but if you treat it with kindness, it opens up immediately

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

blog.name: silverintheslytherin
blog.title: Hello, have a good day
blog.description: Thanks for dropping by, nothing to see here but some sloppy lazy sketchs and bad english.

summary:
Human!Harry and Inferi!Harry

 Those bruises on Human!Harry were because “the freak is clumsy and falls down the stair all the...
caption:
Human!Harry and Inferi!Harry

Those bruises on Human!Harry were because “the freak is clumsy and falls down the stair all the time” and his bandages were from Tom who stole them from his orphanage. (Technically, Harry is a wizard so his wounds will heal quickly but Tom is an overthinking dramatic hoe whose biggest fear is losing his only friend.)

body:
There’s a battle outside

And it is ragin’.

It’ll soon shake your windows

And rattle your walls

For the times they are a-changin’.
